title: 5 Pack Men's Athletic Gym Shorts with Pockets Quick Dry Activewear Workout Running Shorts for Men
description: 【SOFT & BREATHABLE】:The men's athletic shorts are made with soft, breathable, lightweight fabrics, making you feel comfortable during your workout.

【Quick Drying】 Men's casual basketball shorts are made of moisture wicking fabric, which can absorb sweat from the skin and dry gently and quickly, so that you can stay comfortable and dry when exercising, home activities and sports.

【ELASTIC WAISTBAND & INTERNAL DRAWCORD】: The elastic waistband coupled with adjustable internal drawstring, our men's athletic shorts stay comfortably in place whether running or training without sliding up or down.
【LARGE POCKETS】: The men's gym shorts are designed with pockets on both sides that provide the perfect fit for your wallet, smartphones, keys and more.
【Multiple Occasions】: Men's athletic shorts you can use as gym shorts, running shorts, basketball shorts or home leisure shorts, all of which can bring you a comfortable experience.
